Name: target
Description: Name of the calculation condition to be compared with. Needs to be sconditionType Needs to be specified only if the conditionType value is none of \\"and\\", \\"or\\", \\"not\\".

Name: value
Description: Value to be compared with. Needs to be sconditionType Needs to be specified only if the conditionType value is none of \\"and\\", \\"or\\", \\"not\\".
